phrs.translation: 天盾, 小盾, 德国天盾, 圆盾
神圣小盾, 神圣轻圆盾

sentences.sentence: They said the targe was out of reach.
sentences.translation: 他们抱怨说这个目标无法达成。

sentences.sentence: The partial instability for targe scale discrete systems is also discussed.
sentences.translation: 对离散大系统的部分不稳定性我们也进行了研究。

sentences.sentence: Glyph of Crusader strike - your Crusader strike deals 20% more damage when your targe is incapacitated or stunned.
sentences.translation: 十字军打击雕文-伱旳十字军打击对瘫痪或者昏迷旳目标造成20%额外伤害。
